body:
Haven't been active on youtube lately, had a few projects I was working on for my 200th Video but they would all take another week, I decided to start the intro project.
Please note this is my first every minecraft animation. I thought it came out extremely well tho!
So check it out and apply for a chance to win a FREE 3D Minecraft Animation Intro!

Programs I used:
Cinema 4D
AfterEffects

Person I can thank for getting through my struggles of a first time animator:
_Phyre
He gave me tips while animating to make it better, showed me things I had trouble with (Keyframing minecraft characters, terribly long), gave me a few AE presets, e.t.c.

Intro: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XF4siO93VZM

title: 3D Minecraft Animation Intro Giveaway!!!

replies.body: Looks nice for your first intro. :)
replies.body_tagged: Looks nice for your first intro. :)

replies.body: Hey valid I have a Mac and no good editing soft ware can u make me an intro plz
replies.body_tagged: Hey valid I have a Mac and no good editing soft ware can u make me an intro plz

replies.body: But I do have google hangouts and am a friend with ColdCraftMC
replies.body_tagged: But I do have google hangouts and am a friend with ColdCraftMC

replies.body:
Do you want to enter the giveaway or have a custom intro?
If you want the giveaway just fill out the format and then comment on the video or here and put your google hangouts instead of skype.
If you want a custom intro (that is not the giveaway) I sadly ask for money even though I'm pretty new. It does take lots of effort into making intros but I can assure you the price is pretty much 100x less than any other animator asks for :P https://sellfy.com/vladthegreat100.
$2 for the 3D Minecraft Intros (takes a day or two, maybe more) just to animate, and then half a day to use the after effects.
Text Intros will be free for Avicus Players only. Otherwise its $0.90 :P

If you want the text intro just tell me the name you want in the intro and I will make it :P If you want the animated intro the $2 is necessary xd
